snippet: A former senior guard at New York City's main jail complex was arrested on Monday on a federal charge that he deprived a mentally ill inmate of medical aid after he swallowed a corrosive disinfectant....

headline.print_headline: NYC Jail Guard Charged in Death of Inmate Who Ate Disinfectant
headline.main: NYC Jail Guard Charged in Death of Inmate Who Ate Disinfectant

lead_paragraph: A former senior guard at New York City's main jail complex was arrested on Monday on a federal charge that he deprived a mentally ill inmate of medical aid after he swallowed a corrosive disinfectant.
